column1: Hirgon was an emissary of Gondor who presented the Red Arrow to Théoden King of Rohan.
Hirgon had set out on the command of Denethor
column4: and narrowly escaped Orcs in Anóriens woods.  He presented the Arrow on 9 March  and rode back toward Minas Tirith the next day.

column1: Hirgon and his companion were caught by Saurons forces at the Rammas Echor
column2: and were slain before they could reach the White City. When Théodens Riders found their bodies
column3: Théoden understood that Denethor did not receive his message that the Riders were coming for help.
